title: mlm does not participate in training
body:
I have mlm together with other 4 tasks, but mlm does not run at all.
for example:
```
01/25/2020 07:28:47 Task [ 4] updates[ 22000] train loss[0.54155] remaining[0:08:02]
01/25/2020 07:29:34 Task [ 3] updates[ 22500] train loss[0.53300] remaining[0:07:15]
01/25/2020 07:30:23 Task [ 2] updates[ 23000] train loss[0.52634] remaining[0:06:30]
01/25/2020 07:31:13 Task [ 2] updates[ 23500] train loss[0.52038] remaining[0:05:45]
01/25/2020 07:32:00 Task [ 1] updates[ 24000] train loss[0.51205] remaining[0:04:54]
01/25/2020 07:32:47 Task [ 1] updates[ 24500] train loss[0.50485] remaining[0:04:06]
01/25/2020 07:33:36 Task [ 3] updates[ 25000] train loss[0.49875] remaining[0:03:18]
01/25/2020 07:34:24 Task [ 3] updates[ 25500] train loss[0.49261] remaining[0:02:30]
01/25/2020 07:35:11 Task [ 1] updates[ 26000] train loss[0.48538] remaining[0:01:41]
01/25/2020 07:35:59 Task [ 1] updates[ 26500] train loss[0.47805] remaining[0:00:53]
01/25/2020 07:36:47 Task [ 4] updates[ 27000] train loss[0.47243] remaining[0:00:05]

```
I do not see task [ 0]

Keep in mind that I used only train.json (for training) and if I add dev.json (and test.json) then there is another error: issue 141
